ResponseGetData

 ResponseGetData (status:int, response:str, auth:any=None,
                  is_success:bool=False)

class for returning data from any jiralibrary route

ResponseGetData(status=200, response="hello world")

ResponseGetData(status=200, response='hello world', is_success=True)

           body=None, session:httpx.AsyncClient=None)

title: auth
text:
source

JiraAuth

 JiraAuth (instance:str, base_url:str=None)


import os

jira_instance = os.environ["JIRA_INSTANCE"]

JiraAuth(instance=jira_instance)

JiraAuth(instance='onyxreporting.atlassian.net', base_url=None)



source


JiraAuthPat

 JiraAuthPat (instance:str, email:str, pat:str, base_url:str=None)


import os

jira_pat = os.environ["JIRA_PAT"]
jira_instance = os.environ["JIRA_INSTANCE"]

jira_auth = JiraAuthPat(
    pat=jira_pat, email="jae@onyxreporting.com", instance=jira_instance
)

res = await jira_auth.who_am_i(debug_api=False)

res.response

jira_auth

JiraAuthPat(instance='onyxreporting.atlassian.net', email='jae@onyxreporting.com', base_url='https://onyxreporting.atlassian.net')
